thread.title: All RSPCA NSW animals selling for just $29
thread.title_full: All RSPCA NSW animals selling for just $29

title: All RSPCA NSW animals selling for just $29
text:
Share on Twitter 
IN SYDNEY’S world of over-inflated house prices and break-the-bank smashed avo, it’s hard to grab a bargain. 
BUT for one weekend and one weekend only, RSPCA NSW is having an adoption sale to clear out their shelters. And all animals are available for just $29. 
That’s right. $29 for a friend for life — that’s a bloody bargain! Minnie is available for adoption at our Port Macquarie Shelter! Meet her in person or view her full profile here: https://t.co/7WwINqd75P pic.twitter.com/c60Ug1tqAB — RSPCA NSW (@RSPCANSW) January 30, 2017 
Some of the animals have been waiting for a humble abode for over 100 days now, so if you’re looking for a furry friend, this weekend is the perfect opportunity to purchase one ... or four. When I came to RSPCA NSW, I was alone, scared & had nowhere to turn. My name is Patch & I need your help: https://t.co/BTAYybUZqK pic.twitter.com/DE1hS8R2OO — RSPCA NSW (@RSPCANSW) February 17, 2017 
And although the adoption fee is fairly cheap, normal adoption procedures will still apply. Beau is a gorgeous Siberian Husky x who is looking for his forever home. Meet him at our Coffs Harbour Shelter! https://t.co/T7ZdK5dUuy pic.twitter.com/nXo1adm1h0 — RSPCA NSW (@RSPCANSW) February 9, 2017 
So if your in need of a furry friend or you just want to be a good citizen and save one of these adorable creatures, drop by to your closest RSPCA NSW shelter , Care Centre or NSW Petbarn Adoption centre this 24 — 26 February 2017. 
This is pawsibly the best idea ...
